chapter.text: 44|1|Ha mimu.
44|2|(Jibutsu o) meiryo ni suru, kono Keisuke ni kakete (chikau).
44|3|Hontoni ware wa, shukufuku sa reta yoru, kore o kudashite,(aku ni taishite fudan ni) keikoku o atae (yo to su)ru monodearu.
44|4|Sono (yoru) ni wa, eichi ni tsuite subete no koto ga meikaku ni sa reru.
44|5|Waga moto kara no meireidearu. Hontoni ware ga (itsumo shito o) tsukawasu no wa,
44|6|anata no nushi kara no jihidearu. Hontoni kare wa, zen Akira ni shite zenchi de arare,
44|7|ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no subete no mono no omodearu. Moshi anata gata (no shinko) ga tashikanaraba.
44|8|Kare no soto ni kami wa naku,-sei o sazuke shi o sadzuke rareru. Anata gata no shu, mata anata gata no sosen no omode ara reru.
44|9|Sorenanoni kare-ra wa utagatte, tawamurete iru.
44|10|Matte i nasai, ten ga meiryona enmu o okosu hi made.
44|11|(Soreha) hitobito o tsutsumu. (Kare-ra wa iu).`Kore wa itamashi chobatsudesu.'
44|12|`Omo yo, watashi-tachi kara kono chobatsu o menjite kudasai. Hontoni shinko itashimasu.'
44|13|Doshite (futatabi) kare-ra ni kunji ga arou. Kare-ra ni wa komeina shito ga tashika ni kita no ni,
44|14|kare-ra wa kare (shito) kara somuki satte,`tanin ni ire Chie sa reta mono, tsukareta monodesu.' To ittade wanai ka.
44|15|Ware ga shibarakunoaida, chobatsu o kaijo suru to, anata gata wa kanarazu (fushinjin ni) modoru.
44|16|Ware ga moshu suru (shinpan no) Ni~Tsu, hontoni ware wa,(gensei ni) hofuku suru.
44|17|Kare-ra izen ni mo, ware wa firuaun no min o kokoromita. Sonotoki kare-ra ni totoi shito (musa) ga kite,
44|18|(itta. ) `Arra no shimo be-tachi (Isuraeru no shison) o, watashi ni kaeshi nasai. Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata no moto ni yattekita seijitsuna shitodesu.
44|19|Arra ni taishite, komandeatte wa narimasen. Hontoni watashi wa meihakuna ken'i o motte, anata gata no tokoro ni yattekita nodesu.
44|20|Anata gataga (watashi o) ishi uchi ni surunara, watashi soshite anata gata no omode mo aru okata ni, sukui o motomemasu.
44|21|Moshi anata gataga, watashi o shinjinainaraba, watashi ni wa kamawanaide kudasai.'
44|22|Sokode, kare wa omoni ino~tsu(te i~tsu)ta. `Korera wa tsumibukai hitobitodesu.'
44|23|(-Nushi no o kotae ga atta. ) `Anata wa yoru no naka ni, waga shimo be to tomoni tabidate. Kanarazu anata gata ni otte ga kakarou.
44|24|Soshite umi wa (watatta nochi) waketa mama ni shite oke. Hontoni kare-ra wa, oborete shimau kotodearou.'
44|25|Kare-ra wa, ikaga ni oku no en to izumi o nokoshita ka.
44|26|Mata (yutakana) kokumotsu no hata to, kofukuna sumai o,
44|27|mata kare-ra ga soko de kyoraku shite ita yoi mono o (nokoshita ka. )
44|28|(Kare-ra no nochi wa) kodeatta. Soshite ware wa,-gai no min ni (sorera o) tsuga seta.
44|29|Kare-ra no tame ni, ten mo ji mo nakazu, kare-ra ni yuyo mo atae rarenakatta.
44|30|Ware wa, Isuraeru no shison o kutsujoku no chobatsu kara sukui,
44|31|firuaun kara (sukuidashita). Hontoni kare wa, koman de muhomonodeatta.
44|32|Ware wa omou tokoro ni yori, kare-ra o sho minzoku no ue ni eranda.
44|33|Soshite meihakuna shiren o fukumu, kazukazu no shirushi o ataeta.
44|34|Sate korera (makka no guzo shinja) wa (oroka ni mo) iu.
44|35|`Watashi-tachi wa saisho shineba (2-do to) okosa renai.
44|36|Moshi anata gata (no kotoba) ga shinjitsunara, watashi-tachi no sosen o tsuremodoshite mi nasai.'

44|37|Kare-ra (makka no guzo shinja) wa tobbau no min ka, mata sore izen no mono-tachi yori sugurete iru no ka. Ware wa kare-ra (sho minzoku) o horoboshita nodearu. Hontoni kare-ra wa tsumi o okashita monodeatta.
44|38|Ware wa ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono o, tawamure ni tsukutta node wanai.
44|39|Ware wa, tenchi to sonoaida no subete no mono o, tada shinri no tame ni tsukutta. Daga, kare-ra no oku wa rikai shinai.
44|40|Hontoni (zen'aku no) senbetsu no hi wa, subete no mono ni sadame rareta hidearu.
44|41|Sonohi, tomo wa sono tomo no tame ni nani mo yakudatezu, mata kare-ra wa enjo mo e rarenai.
44|42|Daga arra no o jihi o hi mutta-sha-tachi wa betsudearu. Hontoni kare wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukaku ara reru.
44|43|Hontoni a~tsu zakkumu no ki koso wa,
44|44|-zai aru mono no katedearu.
44|45|Sore wa toketa do no yo ni naizo no naka de futto shiyou,
44|46|netto ga tagiri kaeru yo ni.
44|47|(Koe ga shite iwa reyou. ) `Kare o toraeyo, moesakaru hono no tadanaka ni, hikizurikome.
44|48|Sore kara, kare no atama no ue ni futto suru yu no tsuku o abise yo.
44|49|Anata wa (kore o) ajiwauga i. Hontoni anata wa,-ryoku no aru sonkina monodeatta.
44|50|Kore koso anata gataga, utagatte ita monodearu.'
44|51|Hontoni,-nushi o osoreta mono wa, antaina tokoro ni iru.
44|52|En to izumi no ma ni,
44|53|kinu ya nishiki o matoi, tagaini mukaiatte,
44|54|kono yo ni ware wa, kagayaita oki me no otome-tachi o kare-ra no haigusha ni surudearou.
44|55|Kare-ra wa soko de heian ni, subete no kajitsu o motome rare,
44|56|saisho no shi no soto ni, sokode (futatabi) shi o ajiwau koto wa naku, moeru hono no seme ku kara shugo sa reyou.
44|57|Anata no nushi kara no tamamono, sore koso wa shifuku no jojudearo.
44|58|Ware wa kono (kuruan) o, anata no kotoba (Arabia-go) de (oroshi) wakari yasuku shita. Kare-ra wa, rikai shi satosa reru kamo shirenai.
44|59|Dakara shibaraku matte yosu o mi nasai. Hontoni kare-ra no kata mo yosu o ukagatte iru nodakara.
